类 VCardUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shwy.bestjoy.contacts.backup.pim.vcard.VCardUtils

  • public class VCardUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for VCard handling codes.

      • insertStructuredPostalDataUsingContactsStruct

        public static void insertStructuredPostalDataUsingContactsStruct(int vcardType,
                                                 ContentProviderOperation.Builder builder,
                                                 VCardEntry.PostalData postalData,
                                                 int rawContactsResultIndex)

        Inserts postal data into the builder object.

        Note that the data structure of ContactsContract is different from that defined in vCard. So some conversion may be performed in this method.

      • insertStructuredPostalDataUsingContactsStruct

                                                 VCardEntry.PostalData postalData)

        Inserts postal data into the builder object.

        Note that the data structure of ContactsContract is different from that defined in vCard. So some conversion may be performed in this method.

      • constructListFromValue

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> constructListFromValue(java.lang.String value,
                                                      int vcardType)
        Splits the given value into pieces using the delimiter ';' inside it. Escaped characters in those values are automatically unescaped into original form.

      • containsOnlyPrintableAscii

        public static boolean containsOnlyPrintableAscii(java.lang.String... values)

      • containsOnlyPrintableAscii

        public static boolean containsOnlyPrintableAscii(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> values)

      • containsOnlyNonCrLfPrintableAscii

        public static boolean containsOnlyNonCrLfPrintableAscii(java.lang.String... values)

        This is useful when checking the string should be encoded into quoted-printable or not, which is required by vCard 2.1.

        See the definition of "7bit" in vCard 2.1 spec for more information.

      • containsOnlyNonCrLfPrintableAscii

        public static boolean containsOnlyNonCrLfPrintableAscii(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> values)

      • containsOnlyAlphaDigitHyphen

        public static boolean containsOnlyAlphaDigitHyphen(java.lang.String... values)

        This is useful since vCard 3.0 often requires the ("X-") properties and groups should contain only alphabets, digits, and hyphen.

        Note: It is already known some devices (wrongly) outputs properties with characters which should not be in the field. One example is "X-GOOGLE TALK". We accept such kind of input but must never output it unless the target is very specific to the device which is able to parse the malformed input.

      • containsOnlyAlphaDigitHyphen

        public static boolean containsOnlyAlphaDigitHyphen(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> values)

      • containsOnlyWhiteSpaces

        public static boolean containsOnlyWhiteSpaces(java.lang.String... values)

      • containsOnlyWhiteSpaces

        public static boolean containsOnlyWhiteSpaces(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> values)

      • isV21Word

        public static boolean isV21Word(java.lang.String value)

        Returns true when the given String is categorized as "word" specified in vCard spec 2.1.

        vCard 2.1 specifies:
        word = <any printable 7bit us-ascii except []=:., >

      • toStringAsV30ParamValue

        public static java.lang.String toStringAsV30ParamValue(java.lang.String value)

        Returns String available as parameter value in vCard 3.0.

        RFC 2426 requires vCard composer to quote parameter values when it contains semi-colon, for example (See RFC 2426 for more information). This method checks whether the given String can be used without quotes.

        Note: We remove DQUOTE inside the given value silently for now.

      • toStringAsV40ParamValue

        public static java.lang.String toStringAsV40ParamValue(java.lang.String value)

      • toHalfWidthString

        public static java.lang.String toHalfWidthString(java.lang.String orgString)

      • guessImageType

        public static java.lang.String guessImageType(byte[] input)
        Guesses the format of input image. Currently just the first few bytes are used. The type "GIF", "PNG", or "JPEG" is returned when possible. Returns null when the guess failed.
        参数:
        input - Image as byte array.
        返回:
        The image type or null when the type cannot be determined.

      • areAllEmpty

        public static boolean areAllEmpty(java.lang.String... values)
        返回:
        True when all the given values are null or empty Strings.

                                    boolean strictLineBreaking,
                                    java.lang.String sourceCharset,
                                    java.lang.String targetCharset)
        Unquotes given Quoted-Printable value. value must not be null.
